unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Festival Fever Grips India!**
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Festival Fever Grips India!

unnormalised: Yo, movie buffs! Get ready to overdose on cinematic brilliance! Film festival season is officially ON in India, and we're already seeing some serious buzz.
normalised: Yo, movie buffs! Get ready to overdose on cinematic brilliance! Film festival season is officially on in India, and we're already seeing some serious buzz.

unnormalised: The prestigious Kerala International Film Festival (KIFF) just wrapped up in Thiruvananthapuram, showcasing a killer lineup of international and Indian independent films. Heard whispers that this year's theme of "Cinema and Resistance" really resonated with audiences. Did anyone catch the Iranian flick that took home the Suvarna Chakoram (Golden Crow Pheasant)?
normalised: The prestigious Kerala International Film Festival (K I F F) just wrapped up in Thiruvananthapuram, showcasing a killer lineup of international and Indian independent films. Heard whispers that this year's theme of "Cinema and Resistance" really resonated with audiences. Did anyone catch the Iranian flick that took home the Suvarna Chakoram (Golden Crow Pheasant)?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, preps are in full swing for the Jaipur International Film Festival (JIFF) next month. Expect a vibrant mix of Bollywood glam and Rajasthani hospitality.
normalised: Meanwhile, preps are in full swing for the Jaipur International Film Festival (J I F F) next month. Expect a vibrant mix of Bollywood glam and Rajasthani hospitality.

unnormalised: Rumor has it, they're even serving up delicious biryani at some of the after-parties! Imagine discussing Bergman while munching on spicy biryani – pure bliss!
normalised: Rumor has it, they're even serving up delicious biryani at some of the after-parties! Imagine discussing Bergman while munching on spicy biryani – pure bliss!

unnormalised: Don’t forget about local fests popping up across the country too. Keep an eye out for announcements because these smaller festivals are gold mines for discovering fresh talent.
normalised: Don’t forget about local fests popping up across the country too. Keep an eye out for announcements because these smaller festivals are gold mines for discovering fresh talent.

unnormalised: Looks like 2024 is going to be a banger for Indian cinema, both on and off the screen. Happy viewing, folks! Maybe even get some Onam vibes while you're at it (thinking about the post festival blues!).
normalised: Looks like two thousand and twenty four is going to be a banger for Indian cinema, both on and off the screen. Happy viewing, folks! Maybe even get some Onam vibes while you're at it (thinking about the post festival blues!).
